Package com.jgaap.classifiers

Class Summary
AuthorCentroidDriver Assigns authorship labels by using a nearest-neighbor approach on a given distance/divergence function.
AuthorNeighborDriver Assigns authorship labels by using a nearest-neighbor approach on a given distance/divergence function.
BurrowsDelta  
CentroidDriver This is a version of was had been the Frequency Centroid Driver This uses the average relative frequency of events of a single author as a centroid
EventCentroidDriver Assigns authorship labels by using a nearest-neighbor approach on a given distance/divergence function.
FrequencyCentroidDriver This class is designe for its side effects only and should never be added to the main branch of jgaap
KNearestNeighborDriver Assigns authorship labels by using a nearest-neighbor approach on a given distance/divergence function.
LDA  
MahalanobisDistance MahalanobisDistance class does the generalized squared interpoint distance.
MarkovChainAnalysis  
NaiveBayes Naive Bayes classifier performs bayesian probability model with maximum a posterior or MAP rule analysis on a set of data.
NearestNeighborDriver Assigns authorship labels by using a nearest-neighbor approach on a given distance/divergence function.
NullAnalysis NullAnalysis : no analysis, but prints event sets received
NullHistAnalysis NullAnalysis : no analysis, but prints histogram of event sets received
OldLDA  
PCA PCA - Principle Component Analysis Written by: Sandy Speer 10/2008 / NOTE: difference b/t PCA & SPCA -- SPCA normalizes the data set with respect to its variance converts data to z-score
RandomAnalysis Return a random authorship label from the list of known authors.
SPCA SPCA - Standardized Principle Component Analysis Written by: Sandy Speer 10/2008 NOTE: difference b/t PCA & SPCA -- SPCA normalizes the data set with respect to its variance converts data to z-score
SVM SVM classifier rewritten to talk directly to libsvm.
SVMGaussianKernel Wrapper for using SVM with a Gaussian Kernel (This is a dummy class since autopopulation cannot detect parameters at this point) Warning: HIC SVNT DRACONES
VectorOutputAnalysis Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
WEKAAnalysis Generic WEKA classifier.
WEKADecisionStump  
WEKAJ48DecisionTree  
WEKALeastMedSq  
WEKALinearRegression  
WEKAMultilayerPerceptron  
WEKANaiveBayes  
WEKAPaceRegression Pace Regression requires many more training samples than usually available (thousands).
WEKARBFNetwork  
WEKASimpleLinearRegression  
WEKASMO  
WEKAVotedPerceptron
